doc.repnme: The World Bank Group's financial instruments for infrastructure
doc.abstracts: The author explains the financial and contractual structure of the main financial instruments offered by the Bank Group-the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development, the International Development Association, the International Finance Corporation, and the Multilateral Investment Guarantee Agency-to support public and private infrastructure projects. These instruments include loans, guarantees, equity investments, and political risk insurance.
